result.execSummary:
The defendant Matree Xiong was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matree Xiong

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Cheree
Case called: 3:18pm
State appears by ADA K.Puig.  Def appears in person/pro se.  


PLEA:
Ct. 1 (Poss THC)>>GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, def is competent to represent self; a factual basis & def guilty.

COURT ORDERS: $50+CC to be paid within 30 days; Defendant to set up payment plan in COC if not able to pay in 30 days.

Adj: 3:25pm
Calendar call on May 6, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 5, 2015 at 03:20 pm.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 2:06 pm 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears in person, pro se. 
State notes deft had indicated he wanted an attorney. 
Deft states he had an indigency hearing and was found to not qualify for court appointed counsel and intends to proceed pro se. 
COURT provides deft with waiver of right to counsel form to review. 
COURT sets calendar call on 5/6/2015 at 1pm to set hearing re: waiver of counsel. 
Bond Continues. 
Adj: 2:09 pm

Case Called: 10:54 am
Clerk: Kassidi
Appearances:  Defendant appears.
COURT questions def re: employment/income
COURT denies appointment of counsel, def not found indigent.

Adj: 10:57 am

c: Br. 3
Indigency hearing on April 23, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Jury Trial on May 28, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Final pre-trial on May 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on April 13, 2015 at 02:20 pm.

No contact with victim(s): (co-deft) E.G.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol.  No controlled substances without valid prescription.
